entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: The Horcrux is a magical object that Harry and Hermione are trying to protect. It is mentioned as being kept in Harry's bag.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is a location where Harry and Hermione went, but it seems they shouldn't have gone there.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the person who is speaking in this conversation. He has a scar on his chest from a locket.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is the person Harry is talking to. She has a pinched gray face.

relationships.description: Harry Potter possesses the Horcrux, as he mentions it is in his bag.
Godric's Hollow was visited by Harry Potter and Hermione Granger.
Godric's Hollow was also visited by Hermione Granger.
Harry Potter apologized to Hermione Granger for going to Godric's Hollow.
